description: This table contains a row for each time a user was confirmed to be physically present in a patient's home.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The method of physical presence verification


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


NFC Scan In


NFC Scan Out


Start Visit


End Visit


Other NFC Scan

columns.name: VERIFICATION_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of verification of physical presence

columns.name: PRESENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who was physically present at the patient's home.

columns.name: LATITUDE
columns.description: This item stores the latitude of the user's mobile device at the time of physical presence verification.

columns.name: LONGITUDE
columns.description: This item stores the longitude of the user's mobile device at the time of physical presence verification.
